Pre-Game Insights: India have sent a second-string squad to Zimbabwe for the T20I series.
The Indian players who had done well in the Indian Premier League 2024 have been given an opportunity to represent their nation.
Zimbabwe have announced a well-balanced squad to face India.
Shubman Gill has been handed the responsibility of leading the Indian side.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Indian players who had done well in the Indian Premier League 2024 have been given an opportunity to represent their nation.
Zimbabwe and India have faced each other eight times in the shortest format. India have won six of those meetings whereas Zimbabwe have emerged victorious on two occasions.
Others: Harare Sports Club, Harare will host the match.
The match is scheduled for July 6, 2024, at 4:30 PM IST.
Clear skies will greet the two sides on Saturday with temperatures ranging between 12 and 26 degrees Celsius.
Sony Sports Network will broadcast the match live, while SonyLIV app will offer live streaming.
